### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE experimental_results (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_name TEXT,
  experiment_date DATE,
  result_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE experimenters (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name TEXT,
  job_title TEXT,
  department TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE experiments (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_name TEXT,
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME
)

CREATE TABLE lab_equipment (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name TEXT,
  quantity INT,
  location TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE experiment_logs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_id INT,
  experimenter_id INT,
  log_date TIMESTAMP,
  notes TEXT
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE experimental_results SET result_value = 10 WHERE id = 1;
